Title: Relates to World Trade Center benefits
Summary: Relates to filing timely notices of participation in World Trade Center rescue efforts for the purposes of receiving World Trade Center benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-252.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the verification of participation in the rescue, recovery, and clean-up operations at the site of the World Trade Center terror attacks on September 11, 2001
